data.title: Pete Edochie: Biography, Career, Net Worth And Expensive Cars He owns
data.meta_description: Considered one of Africa's most talented actors, Pete Edochie is a seasoned Nollywood actor who has starred in hundreds of movies. He has received various
data.text:
Considered one of Africa’s most talented actors, Pete Edochie is a seasoned Nollywood actor who has starred in hundreds of movies. He has received various honorary awards and titles including being honoured as a Member of the Order of the Niger by President Olusegun Obasanjo.

Pete Edochie: PROFILE

Pete Edochie: BIOGRAPHY

Pete Edochie was born on March 7, 1947 in Zaria. He is of Igbo origin, precisely from Anambra state and has a strong Catholic faith. As of 2023, Pete Edochie will be 76 years old. On his 70th birthday celebration, Pete Edochie shared one of his secrets to long life and purposefulness. He said: “Taking life easy and planning purposefully for everything makes life worth living as well as ageing gracefully”.

He had his primary education at St. Patrick’s and St. James Primary School, Zaria. When he was done, he proceeded to St. John’s College for secondary education. Completing his SSCE education, Pete Edochie worked at the Nigerian Railway Corporation before going for further studies. For his higher studies, Pete Edochie attended the School of Journalism and Television in England and also took some courses abroad.

Pete Edochie: CAREER

Pete Edochie began his career as a radio broadcaster at the age of 20. He started work as a Junior programmes officer at ABS before he was promoted to the Director role. Serving in his role as Director, Pete Edochie also had to double as the Deputy Managing Director and Director as well.

Quitting his work at the FM station, Pete Edochie enrolled in the movie industry. He was featured in the award-winning movie, Things Fall Apart which earned him an international award. His first time on stage was as a student at St. John’s College in the movie Merchant of Venice by William Shakespeare. His ground-breaking act in Things Fall Apart brought him to the limelight in the Nollywood industry.

Pete Edochie: PERSONAL LIFE

Pete Edochie got married to Josephine Edochie at the prime age of 22. The union is blessed with six children consisting of 5 boys and 1 girl. Following in the footsteps of their father, Linc and Yul Edochie are also top actors in the Nollywood movie industry. Pete Edochie’s marriage is one of the longest in the Nollywood movie industry, and according to him, he has never thought of taking another wife.

Pete Edochie: AWARDS AND RECOGNITION

Pete Edochie is a well-recognized actor in Nigeria and abroad. He has received honorary awàrds both locally and Internationally. He was inducted into the Hall of Fame 2003 shortly after being conferred Member of the Order of the Niger. Below is a list of some of his awards and recognition:

Movie Personality of the Year, City People Magazine, 1999

Best Actor in Africa, Censors’ Board, 2001

Best Actor in Nigeria, Censors’ Board, 2003

Member of the Order of the Niger, Former President Olusegun Obasanjo, 2003

Special Recognition Award, Best of Nollywood (BON), along with Lanre Hassan (Iya Awero), Former Governor Emmanuel Udaghan, 2013

Lifetime Achievement Award, Africa Movie Academy Awards, 2013

Industry Merit Award, Africa Magic Viewers’ Choice Awards, 2014

Life Impact Awards, Times Heroes Awards, 2017.

Pete Edochie: NET WORTH

Pete Edochie is ranked amongst the richest and most influential actors in Nigeria. His net worth is estimated at $3.7 million.

Pete Edochie: CARS

Being a proud father and one who keeps to his word, Pete Edochie reportedly bought cars for his six children. The car was a promise he made to them to keep them motivated enough to complete higher education.

Considering Pete Edochie’s net worth and being a successful actor, we can suspect that Pete Edochie can afford cars like:

Toyota Highlander

Toyota Highlander is a luxurious SUV that is reliable and comfortable, especially great for off-road driving. It has impressive features that promise comfort and convenience for its owners. It costs between 55-70 million NGN.

Lexus LX 570

Built with top-quality materials, the entire structure of the LX 570 is strongly appealing. The LX-570 features one of the most luxurious cabins, with spacious seats containing enough legroom and headroom. It costs between 60-75 million NGN.

PETE EDOCHIE: HOUSE

Peter Edochie lives in a luxurious, comfortable house with his family.

CONCLUSION

Pete Edochie is definitely a veteran and highly talented actor. He is a coach and mentor to various youths desirous to prosper in the movie industry.
